storypart5.bildtext: The meal is ready. Maria wants to drink a glass of water before she starts eating.

storypart6.bildtext: Tap water is very clean in Germany so you can drink it without doubt.

storypart7.bildtext: Drinking alcohol is legal at the age of 18, but it's totally accepted to refuse it.

storypart8.bildtext: Now it's time for cleaning up the kitchen and disposing the rubbish.

storypart10.bildtext: Most of the bottles are returnable bottles, so they can be used once again. Empty glasses should be thrown into glass recycling containers.
